titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Queen, at White-Hall, April VIII, MDCXCII being the fast-day appointed by Her Majesty, to implore God's blessing on Their Majesties persons, and the prosperity of their arms both at land and sea / by ... Symon, Lord Bishop of Ely.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

notesStmt.note: Running title: A fast-sermon before the Queen.
Half title: The Bishop of Ely's fast-sermon before the Queen, April 8, 1692.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
